description:
Dallas has one of the highest rates of motor vehicle accidents in Texas, and many of those accidents result in catastrophic or fatal injuries. At Hernandez Law Group, P.C., we know that many of these accidents occur because too many impaired, distracted or otherwise negligent drivers are on the road. Whether you have been injured in a car crash, a trucking accident, a pedestrian accident or some other event, we want to help you seek the compensation you deserve for your suffering and pain.

Our skilled and compassionate attorneys are fierce defendants of the rights of those who have suffered needlessly because of the recklessness or negligence of others. We will fight for your just compensation in court, and we will take on the insurance company who is trying to manipulate you into accepting less than you deserve. In addition to motor vehicle accidents, we have a record of success assisting clients with injuries resulting from the following and more:

  • Aviation and mass transit accidents
  • Construction and other workplace accidents
  • Defective drugs, medical devices and other products
  • Medical malpractice, birth injuries, and nursing home neglect and abuse
  • Premises liability cases
  • Sexual abuse, assault and battery, and other crimes

Hernandez Law Group, P.C., also helps countless clients who are seeking U.S. visas, green cards or citizenship through the naturalization process. We have attorneys and staff at our law office who speak fluent Spanish and English.

If you are injured and dealing with the physical, emotional and financial aftermath, or if you are seeking a better life in the U.S., you do not have to face this task alone. Contact our law firm to get answers to your questions during a free initial consultation. We also offer virtual options if you have concerns about your health in these times of uncertainty.
